transcript: Julie in a confidential conversa- tion without at all noticing that his involun- tary smile had stabbed the heart of S6nya, who blushed and smiled unnaturally. In the midst of his talk he glanced round at her. She gave him a passionately angry glance, and hardly able to restrain her tears and maintain the artificial smile on her lips, she got up and left the room. All Nicholas' animation vanished. He waited for the first pause in the conversa- tion, and then with a distressed face left the room
